content.question: The figure above represents a rough endoplasmic reticulum. Which of the following best describes the role of the structure labeled Y?

choices.label: Structure Y contributes the raw materials required for the synthesis of proteins.
Structure Y packages proteins for export from the cell.
Structure Y is the location where proteins are synthesized.
Structure Y contains enzymes that cut and activate proteins.

content.answer: Structure Y is the location where proteins are synthesized.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
